alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 2:30PM MST until March 23 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy rain and melting snow have lead to fast rising flows in rivers, which will reach critical levels. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, Yavapai. * WHEN...Until 830 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. Deadly flooding over low-water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 229 PM MST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain and snowmelt. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Williamson Valley Wash, Little Chino Valley, Granite Creek, Hell Canyon, Big Chino Wash, Verde River and Mud Tank Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paulden. - This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 335 and 337. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report any flooding to local law enforcement and the NWS Flagstaff when you can do so safely.
